SELECT
m_track.ID as "id", m_track.NAME as "name", m_track.ARTIST as "artist", m_track.INSTRUMENTAL as "instrumental", m_track.ORIGINAL as "original", m_file.ARTICLE_ID as "fileBean.ARTICLE_ID", m_file.checksum as "fileBean.checksum",
FROM m_track LEFT JOIN m_file ON m_file.ID = m_track.ID
m_file.ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} AND m_file.DEL_FLG='0' AND m_track.DEL_FLG='0'
ORDER BY m_file.ORDER_NO
